mapper.insert: insert into chatroom(user_id, ch_title, ch_description, ch_write, ch_pw_check, ch_pw) values(#{user_id}, #{ch_title}, #{ch_description}, now(), #{ch_pw_check}, #{ch_pw})
mapper.select: select ch_pw from chatroom where ch_seq=#{ch_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into chatmember(user_id, ch_seq) select #{user_id}, #{ch_seq} from dual where not exists(select user_id from chatmember where user_id=#{user_id})
mapper.delete: delete from chatmember where ch_seq=#{ch_seq} and user_id=#{user_id}
